code: import React from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const steps=["Veri Girişi","Strateji Seçimi","Analiz ve Sonuç"];function Stepper(_ref){let{activeStep}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{display:'flex',justifyContent:'space-between',alignItems:'center',marginBottom:24,maxWidth:400,marginLeft:'auto',marginRight:'auto',fontSize:14},children:steps.map((label,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{flex:1,textAlign:'center',color:idx===activeStep?'#1976d2':'#888',fontWeight:idx===activeStep?'bold':'normal',position:'relative'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{width:28,height:28,borderRadius:'50%',background:idx===activeStep?'#1976d2':'#e0e0e0',color:idx===activeStep?'#fff':'#888',display:'inline-flex',alignItems:'center',justifyContent:'center',marginBottom:4,marginLeft:'auto',marginRight:'auto',fontWeight:'bold',fontSize:15},children:idx+1}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:label}),idx<steps.length-1&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{position:'absolute',top:14,right:-2,left:'100%',height:2,background:'#e0e0e0',zIndex:0}})]},label))});}export default Stepper;
